name: 咬咬

effect.description: A sharp biting attack that has a 30% chance to make the target flinch for 1 turn.

skillVisualPrompt: 8-bit pixel art animation of two jagged, dark-purple energy jaws snapping shut from top and bottom. Sharp white diagonal impact lines and yellow rectangular sparks explode at the center of the bite. Pure VFX animation on a solid pure green screen background (Hex: #00FF00). No characters, no hands.
statusVisualPrompt: 8-bit pixel art looping animation of three rotating yellow four-pointed stars and white swirling dizzy lines. The stars bob up and down slightly in a rhythmic pattern. Isolated effect on a solid pure green screen background (Hex: #00FF00). No characters.
